root.name: 1701 A.D.
root.description: 1701 A.D. is an RTS game that takes place during colonial times. You take up the role of colonizing island, fighting off your enemies, and eventually declaring independence and becoming a Civilization.The choices for building your colonies differ greatly because each island has different resources, which forces you to trade with your allies or enemies.
